item.title: Basic Auth without the Hubub in NGINX
item.description: Today I learned that it IS possible to make a relatively simple static site that has some automatic authentication built in to NGINX that will use a custom HTML file for the login page as opposed to the basic-auth prompt that gets so annoying.
item.dc:creator: Joe Stanley

item.title: Write a Good Framework - ONCE.
item.description: We all want that next great application; NOW. And we KNOW that we can just hash out this great new thing. But where does that leave us the next time we want to do the same sort of thing?
item.dc:creator: Joe Stanley
